= valuesToStack =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [valuesToSyntax valuesTo] > [valuesToStackMethod valuesToStack]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$values* _Array|String|phpQueryObject_

 * *$skipFields* __ = null

 * *$fieldCallback* __ = null



Replaces nodes from stack with $markup using markup() insted of replaceWith().
Method doesn't change selected elements stack.
Example  
{{{
 $values = array('<foo/>', '<bar/>');
 $template['node1']->valuesToStack($values);

}}}
Source  
{{{
 <node1>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>
 <node1>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>

}}}
Result  
{{{
 <node1>
   <foo/>
 </node1>
 <node1>
   <bar/>
 </node1>

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
